special_powers.name: NINJA POWER, BRO!
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - If Raphael is adjacent to a friendly character named Michelangelo, modify Raphael's defense value by +1 against range attacks, and he can use the Carry ability to carry up to 3 characters with the TMNT keyword.

special_powers.name: NINJA POWER, BRO!
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - If Michelangelo is adjacent to a friendly character named Donatello, modify Michelangelo's defense value by +1 against range attacks, and he can use the Carry ability to carry up to 3 characters with the TMNT keyword.

special_powers.name: NINJA POWER, BRO!
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - If Donatello is adjacent to a friendly character named Leonardo, modify Donatello's defense value by +1 against range attacks, and he can use the Carry ability to carry up to 3 characters with the TMNT keyword.

special_powers.name: TRIP AND PUSH
special_powers.description: Donatello can use Force Blast and Plasticity.

special_powers.name: NINJA POWER, BRO!
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - If Leonardo is adjacent to a friendly character named Raphael, modify Leonardo's defense value by +1 against range attacks, and he can use the Carry ability to carry up to 3 characters with the TMNT keyword.

special_powers.name: FREELANCE REPORTER
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may choose an opposing character within 4 squares and line of fire. Until your next turn, that character can't be targeted with Perplex or Probability Control from a character friendly to it.

special_powers.name: CRISIS TIME MACHINE
special_powers.description: Fugitoid can use Probability Control. Once per turn when a character within range and line of fire rolls a critical hit or critical miss, the attack may be rerolled.

special_powers.name: INVISIBILITY TECH
special_powers.description: Give Foot Tech a power action to place an Invisible token on this card if there isn't one already on it. While there is an Invisible token on this card, Foot Tech can't be targeted by non-adjacent opposing characters and modifies his defense value by +2. When Foot Tech attacks or is attacked, after actions resolve remove the Invisible token.

special_powers.name: KATAR, PENETRATING DAGGER
special_powers.description: Foot Tech can use Blades/Claws/Fangs. When Foot Tech makes a close attack while occupying hindering terrain, the damage dealt is penetrating.

special_powers.name: INVISIBILITY TECH
special_powers.description: Give Foot Tech a power action to place an Invisible token on this card if there isn't one already on it. While there is an Invisible token on this card, Foot Tech can't be targeted by non-adjacent opposing characters and modifies his defense value by +2. When Foot Tech attacks or is attacked, after actions resolve remove the Invisible token.

special_powers.name: THREE-SEGMENT STAFF
special_powers.description: Give Foot Tech a power action. Make a close attack targeting up to three adjacent opposing characters. Hit characters are each dealt 1 damage instead of normal damage and given an action token.

special_powers.name: INVISIBILITY TECH
special_powers.description: Give Foot Tech a power action to place an Invisible token on this card if there isn't one already on it. While there is an Invisible token on this card, Foot Tech can't be targeted by non-adjacent opposing characters and modifies his defense value by +2. When Foot Tech attacks or is attacked, after actions resolve remove the Invisible token.

special_powers.name: SHURIKEN, WEAPON OF DISTRACTION
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - When Foot Tech hits with a range attack, hit characters modify their attack and defense values by -1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: INVISIBILITY TECH
special_powers.description: Give Foot Tech a power action to place an Invisible Token on this card if there isn't one already on it. While there is an Invisible Token on this card Foot Tech can't be targeted by non-adjacent characters and modifies his defense value by +2. When Foot Tech attacks or is attacked, after actions resolve remove the Invisible token.

special_powers.name: TWIN KATANAS
special_powers.description: Foot Tech can use Blades/Claws/Fangs. When he does he may instead roll 2d6 and choose one as the result.

special_powers.name: GOONGALA!
special_powers.description: Casey Jones can use Quake. After an action resolves in which he moved 3 squares or less, he can use Quake as a free action.

special_powers.name: APRIL, LET ME TEACH YOU
special_powers.description: Splinter can use Empower. UNIQUE MODIFIER- When Splinter hits an opposing character, modify the attack value of all other friendly characters by +1 this turn.

special_powers.name: SCURRYING TENDRILS
special_powers.description: Kraang can use Flurry and Sidestep.

special_powers.name: VOLUNTEER TO BECOME STRONGER
special_powers.description: When Bebop KO's an opposing character, rolls a critical hit, or is healed, after actions resolve place a Mutagen token on this card and you may roll a d6 that can't be rerolled. If the result plus the number of Mutagen tokens is 7 or more, replace this character with a character on the same click number named Bebop with a point value of 100 or less, then heal that character 1 click.

special_powers.name: VOLUNTEER TO BECOME STRONGER
special_powers.description: When Rocksteady KO's an opposing character, rolls a critical hit, or is healed, after actions resolve place a Mutagen token on this card and you may roll a d6 that can't be rerolled. If the result plus the number of Mutagen tokens is 7 or more, replace this character with a character on the same click number named Rocksteady with a point value of 100 or less, then heal that character 1 click.

special_powers.name: BANISHED...
special_powers.description: STOP. For the rest of the game, Rocksteady can't be healed.

special_powers.name: MECH SUIT
special_powers.description: Nobody can use Hypersonic Speed, but only to make close attacks.

special_powers.name: FIGHTING THE GOOD FIGHT
special_powers.description: Nobody can use Leadership. When Nobody uses Leadership and succeeds, she may also remove an action token from herself.

special_powers.name: SWINGING CROWBAR
special_powers.description: When an opposing character takes damage from Malo's attack, after actions resolve give that character an action token.

special_powers.name: I WOULD RECOGNIZE THAT RAGE ANYWHERE
special_powers.description: A named theme team can include Mona Lisa and is still a theme team if your force includes a character named Raphael. -UNIQUE MODIFIER- When adjacent to or attacking a character named Raphael modify Mona Lisa's attack by +1.

special_powers.name: TAIL SPIKES, LASER SWORD, AND BLASTER
special_powers.description: Mona Lisa can use Blades/Claws/Fangs, Flurry, and Giant Reach: 2.

special_powers.name: BANISHED...
special_powers.description: STOP. For the rest of the game, Bebop can't be healed.

special_powers.name: DUEL OF TWISTED HONOR
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose an opposing character that isn't the lowest point character on that force. Opposing characters that weren't chosen modify their attack value by -2 when attacking Shredder Clone unless the chosen character has been KO'd.

special_powers.name: SHREDDER ELITE
special_powers.description: Shredder Clone can use Sidestep. When he moves, after actions resolve deal 1 penetrating damage to each adjacent opposing character that wasn't adjacent at the beginning of the move.

special_powers.name: OCEAN RESURRECTION
special_powers.description: When Shredder Clone would be KO'd, you may replace him with TMNT3 #035 Shark Shredder on click #4. That character can't be healed this game except by using Steal Energy.

special_powers.name: CRUEL TEACHINGS
special_powers.description: When a friendly character attacks and an opposing character is KO'd or takes 2 or more penetrating damage, after actions resolve heal the attacking character 1 click.

special_powers.name: I HAVE YOUR COMBINED POWERS
special_powers.description: Sliver can use Plasticity and Sidestep, and has Wing symbol and Giant symbol.

special_powers.name: ZERO-G NINJUTSU
special_powers.description: Raphael can use the Flight ability and ignores knock back damage. When given a non-free action, if Raphael is adjacent to blocking terrain or a square of higher elevation, Raphael modifies his speed and attack values by +1 for that action.

special_powers.name: ENERGY SAI
special_powers.description: When Raphael hits a single opposing character with a close attack, instead of dealing normal damage, you may deal the target 2 penetrating damage and give it an action token.

special_powers.name: ZERO-G NINJITSU
special_powers.description: Michelangelo can use the flight ability and ignores knockback damage. When given a non-free action, if Michelangelo is adjacent to blocking terrain or a square of higher elevation, Michelangelo modifies his speed and attack values by +1 for that action.

special_powers.name: WE'RE NINJAS, BRAH!
special_powers.description: Michelangelo can use Smoke Cloud as a free action. When he does, friendly characters occupying these hindering markers this turn can use Sidestep.

special_powers.name: ZERO-G NINJITSU
special_powers.description: Donatello can use the Flight ability and ignores knock back damage. When given a non-free action, if Donatello is adjacent to blocking terrain or a square of higher elevation, Donatello modifies his speed and attack values by +1 for that action.

special_powers.name: SCANNER STAFF
special_powers.description: Once per turn, Donatello can use either Outwit or Perplex. When he uses either, he does not need line of fire if his target is within 4 squares.

special_powers.name: ZERO-G NINJUTSU
special_powers.description: Leonardo can use the Flight ability and ignores knock back damage. When given a non-free action, if Leonardo is adjacent to blocking terrain or a square of higher elevation, Leonardo modifies his speed and attack values by +1 for that action.

special_powers.name: RACING FOR THE PIECES OF THE BLACK HOLE GENERATOR
special_powers.description: When an opposing character would be equipped or begins the game equipped, you and that character's controller each roll 2d6 that can't be rerolled. If your result is higher, remove that equipment from the game.

special_powers.name: LITERAL HIVE OF SCUM AND VILLAINY
special_powers.description: When Lord Dregg takes damage from an attack, place adjacent a Robug bystander. Give Lord Dregg a power action and place adjacent up to 3 Robug bystanders so that there are no more than 3 Robug bystanders on the map. This can't be ignored.

special_powers.name: FEARED CLAW OF THE COSMIC UNDERBELLY
special_powers.description: Lord Dregg can use Blades/Claws/Fangs and Giant Reach: 2. When he hits with a close attack but the target doesn't take damage, after actions resolve give that target an action token.

special_powers.name: RULER OF ALL INSECT LIFE IN THE UNIVERSE
special_powers.description: Lord Dregg can use Leadership and Perplex. When Lord Dregg uses Perplex to target himself and doesn't modify his damage value, also modify the same combat value on all friendly characters within 4 squares that are named Robug or have the Monster keyword.

special_powers.name: CARRY ME TO SAFETY, DINO
special_powers.description: Give Savanti Romero a power action to place adjacent a Pterodactyl bystander. If none are on the map this is a free action instead.

special_powers.name: BLACKEST OF MAGICKS
special_powers.description: Savanti Romero can use Probability Control. When an opposing character is KO'd, place a Black Magic token on his card, Once during your opponent's turn, you may remove a Black Magic token from his card to use Probability Control a second time.

special_powers.name: SHARE THE WISHES! THESE ARE HARD ECONOMIC TIMES!
special_powers.description: Wyrm begins the game with 3 Wish tokens on this card. Once per turn, an adjacent friendly character may be given a free action to remove a Wish token. When you do, roll a d6 that can't be rerolled.  2-3: Modify one of that character's combat values by +1.  4-5: Modify that character's combat values by +1.  6: That character can use the standard power of your choice.  Any result lasts until your next turn. When Wyrm has no Wish tokens, at the beginning of your turn deal 1 unavoidable damage to each adjacent character.

special_powers.name: WYRM FEELS LIKE CAUSING A BIT OF CHAOS
special_powers.description: Wyrm can use Phasing/Teleport, Probability Control, Shape Change and his powers can't be countered.

special_powers.name: MYSTICAL WORMS
special_powers.description: When Claw Shredder would be KO'd for the first time each game, instead turn him to click #4 and an opponent places him adjacent to one of their characters. This can't be ignored.

special_powers.name: SHREDDER ELITE
special_powers.description: Claw Shredder can use Sidestep. When he moves, after actions resolve deal 1 penetrating damage to each adjacent opposing character that he wasn't adjacent to at the beginning of the move.

special_powers.name: CLAW DISARM
special_powers.description: Claw Shredder can use Giant Reach: 2. Give Claw Shredder a free action and choose a character he's hit with an attack this turn. The chosen Character can't make an attack until your next turn.

special_powers.name: MYSTICAL WORMS
special_powers.description: When Mini Shredder would be KO'd for the first time each game, instead turn him to click 4 and an opponent places them adjacent to one of their characters. This can't be ignored.

special_powers.name: SHREDDER ELITE
special_powers.description: Mini Shredder can use Sidestep. When he moves, after actions resolve deal 1 penetrating damage to each adjacent opposing character that wasn't adjacent at the beginning of the move.

special_powers.name: WHERE'D HE GO?
special_powers.description: Mini Shredder can use Plasticity and Stealth.

special_powers.name: MYSTICAL WORMS
special_powers.description: When Shiva Shredder would be KO'd for the first time each game, instead turn him to click 4 and an opponent places them adjacent to one of their characters. This can't be ignored.

special_powers.name: SHREDDER ELITE
special_powers.description: Shiva Shredder can use Sidestep. When he moves, after actions resolve deal 1 penetrating damage to each adjacent opposing character that wasn't adjacent at the beginning of the move.

special_powers.name: MULTI-ARM MENACE
special_powers.description: Give Shiva Shredder a close combat action and lock his damage value at 2. He may make up to four close attacks, using his printed attack value.

special_powers.name: MYSTICAL WORMS
special_powers.description: If Shark Shredder began the game on your force and would be KO'd for the first time each game, instead turn him to click #4 and an opponent places him adjacent to one of their characters. This can't be ignored.

special_powers.name: SHREDDER ELITE
special_powers.description: Shark Shredder can use Sidestep. When he moves, after actions resolve deal 1 penetrating damage to each adjacent opposing character that he wasn't adjacent to at the beginning of the move.

special_powers.name: FEED ON YOUR SOULS
special_powers.description: Shark Shredder can use Blades/Claws/Fangs and Steal Energy. When he hits an opposing character, that character can't be moved or placed until your next turn.

special_powers.name: SPELL OF REVERSAL
special_powers.description: When an opposing character within 6 squares and line of fire makes an attack with an attack value or damage value greater than its printed value, roll a d6 that can't be rerolled for each greater value. 3-5: That character uses its printed value instead and it is locked. 6: That character uses its printed value -1 instead and it is locked.
